rdf:Description.dc:description: Cover title: Cold Lake regional baseline study.
Vols. 1-2 have subtitle: General population; vols. 3-4 have subtitle: Special populations.
Vol. 5 prepared by Peat, Marwick and Partners.
"Project conducted by Thames Group Research and the Population Research Laboratory, the University of Alberta."
"Prepared for the Northern Development Branch, Alberta Small Business and Tourism."
On cover: Prepared for the Northern Alberta Development Council.
1-2. Pre-impact study -- 3. Canadian Forces Base Cold Lake -- 4. The Indian reservations and Metis settlements -- 5. Business survey -- 6. Research methods.
